org.waarp.ftp.core.data.handler

Class DataBusinessHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.ftp.core.data.handler.DataBusinessHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSystemBasedDataBusinessHandler, FileSystemBasedDataBusinessHandler

    public abstract class DataBusinessHandler
extends Object
    This class is to be implemented in order to allow Business actions according to FTP service
